sources.title: Keep 'Em Flying (1941)
sources.description: When a barnstorming stunt pilot decides to join the air corps, his two goofball assistants decide to go with him. Since the two are Abbott & Costello, the air corps doesn't know what it's in for. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/keep-em-flying-1941/

metadata.Plot: When a barnstorming stunt pilot joins the Air Corps, his two goofball assistants decide to go with him.
metadata.Writer: True Boardman, Nat Perrin, John Grant
metadata.Actors: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Martha Raye
